name: Sea of Brave: Aidan Adventure
description:
Sea of Brave - Aidan Adventure is an action-adventure platformer with a classic 2D platforming gameplay style. Join Aidan on his perilous journey to save his father and the villagers of Figon Island from the terrifying hands of Captain Skull and his pirate crew. Uncover the mystery of the island and explore each level to find treasures, challenges and new skills. Face fearsome bosses by following the path of fire, throw a fireball, perform a flaming dash, or why not create a fire dragon, these and other skills can be found by exploring the different areas of the game.



Features:
• Discover the secrets of Figon Island in its six different zones (Paradise Beach, Green Forest, Underwater Zone, Underground Zone, Snow Zone and the Volcanic Zone), in over 36 levels with more than 50 in-game challenges.
• Explore the different levels to find treasures, challenges and new skills.
• Face fearsome final bosses to defeat Captain Skull's pirate crew.
• Enjoy a challenging platform game.
